features: Dimensions (inflated): 5 in D x 4.25 in H (12.7 cm D x 10.8 cm H)
Dimensions (collapsed): 5 in D x 1 in H (12.7 cm D x 2.5 cm H)
8 color modes: Lavender, Violet, Sky, Powder, Mint, Lime, Coral, Rose
Color Cycle mode (lasts up to 6 hrs)
Battery level indicator / 1000 mAh Lithium-Ion Battery
Quick shut off: hold down power button for 2 seconds
Lasts up to 24 hours on a full charge / fully charged in 7 hours of direct sunlight
Splash, water, dust resistant; submersible up to 1m (IP67 rating)
100% warranty protection for the 1st year from manufacturer defects
100% quality tested and certified by international global standards
